CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.patents.cpc_definition`
(
  applicationReferences ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  breakdownCode BOOL,
  childGroups ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, symbols ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  children ARRAY<STRING>,
  dateRevised FLOAT64,
  definition ARRAY<STRING>,
  glossary ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  informativeReferences ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  ipcConcordant STRING,
  level FLOAT64,
  limitingReferences ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  notAllocatable BOOL,
  parents ARRAY<STRING>,
  precedenceLimitingReferences ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  residualReferences ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  rules ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  scopeLimitingReferences ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  status STRING,
  symbol STRING,
  synonyms ARRAY<STRUCT<description STRING, target ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  titleFull STRING,
  titlePart ARRAY<STRING>
);

CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.patents.disclosures_13`
(
  family_id STRING,
  record_id STRING,
  disclosure_event STRING,
  sso STRING,
  patent_owner_harmonized STRING,
  patent_owner_unharmonized STRING,
  date INT64,
  standard STRING,
  committee_project STRING,
  tc_name STRING,
  sc_name STRING,
  wg_name STRING,
  licensing_commitment STRING,
  copyright STRING,
  blanket_type STRING,
  blanket_scope STRING,
  third_party STRING,
  reciprocity STRING,
  serial_cleaned STRING,
  pub_cleaned STRING
);

CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.patents.publications`
(
  publication_number STRING,
  application_number STRING,
  country_code STRING,
  kind_code STRING,
  application_kind STRING,
  application_number_formatted STRING,
  pct_number STRING,
  family_id STRING,
  spif_publication_number STRING,
  spif_application_number STRING,
  title_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING, language STRING, truncated BOOL>>,
  abstract_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING, language STRING, truncated BOOL>>,
  claims_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING, language STRING, truncated BOOL>>,
  claims_localized_html ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING, language STRING, truncated BOOL>>,
  description_localized ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING, language STRING, truncated BOOL>>,
  description_localized_html ARRAY<STRUCT<text STRING, language STRING, truncated BOOL>>,
  publication_date INT64,
  filing_date INT64,
  grant_date INT64,
  priority_date INT64,
  priority_claim ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING, application_number STRING, npl_text STRING, type STRING, category STRING, filing_date INT64>>,
  inventor ARRAY<STRING>,
  inventor_harmonized ARRAY<STRUCT<name STRING, country_code STRING>>,
  assignee ARRAY<STRING>,
  assignee_harmonized ARRAY<STRUCT<name STRING, country_code STRING>>,
  examiner ARRAY<STRUCT<name STRING, department STRING, level STRING>>,
  uspc ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING, inventive BOOL, first BOOL, tree ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  ipc ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING, inventive BOOL, first BOOL, tree ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  cpc ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING, inventive BOOL, first BOOL, tree ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  fi ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING, inventive BOOL, first BOOL, tree ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  fterm ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING, inventive BOOL, first BOOL, tree ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  locarno ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING, inventive BOOL, first BOOL, tree ARRAY<STRING>>>,
  citation ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING, application_number STRING, npl_text STRING, type STRING, category STRING, filing_date INT64>>,
  parent ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING, application_number STRING, npl_text STRING, type STRING, category STRING, filing_date INT64>>,
  child ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING, application_number STRING, npl_text STRING, type STRING, category STRING, filing_date INT64>>,
  entity_status STRING,
  art_unit STRING
);
